typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	debtorcode as integer (321197),
	filenametick as integer (637636856972825204)
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'csvexport',
	folderPath: (toString($debtorcode)),
	fileName: (concat(toString($filenametick),"productsperdebtorcode.csv")),
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> ProductListPerDebtor
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'json',
	fileSystem: 'csvexport',
	folderPath: (concat(toString($debtorcode),"/",toString($filenametick),"/merged")),
	fileName: 'stock.json',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> MergedStocklistPerDebtor
